bill.title: Minimum wage for certain Indiana employees. After: (1) June 30, 2016, increases the minimum wage paid to certain employees in Indiana from $7.25 to $12.00; and (2) June 30, 2017, increases the minimum wage paid to certain employees in Indiana from $12.00 to $15.00; an hour. After June 30, 2018, and each successive June 30, increases the hourly minimum wage in the same percentage as any increase in the Consumer Price Index for the preceding calendar year. Makes technical corrections and corresponding changes. Removes outdated language.

history.action: First reading: referred to Committee on Pensions & Labor
